hero.name: Bilal Ezzaim
hero.title: Full-stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about modern web development and creating innovative applications

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Bilal Ezzaim, a passionate 26-year-old MERN Stack developer. A graduate of YouCode in 2025, I now focus on building modern and high-performance web applications.
aboutSection.paragraph2: My passion for web development has led me to master the entire MERN stack, allowing me to create complete applications from backend to frontend. I am always looking for new challenges and learning opportunities.

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer - Fondation Mohammed VI
experiences.description: Development and maintenance of an internal web application using ASP.NET and C#.

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer - Tbeninnovation
experiences.description: Development of a real-time chat (Express, WebSocket, PostgreSQL, Prisma) and backend upload (C#, AWS S3 integration).

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer - BOOKIZONE
experiences.description: 3-month internship where I participated in the 'Gestion de Syndique' project, a web and mobile app for managing residential complexes (Super Admin, Syndique, Residents).

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Custom solutions for your web projects

fullStack.title: Full Stack Development
fullStack.description: Creating complete and performant web applications with the latest MERN Stack technologies.

responsiveSites.title: Responsive Websites
responsiveSites.description: Design of adaptive websites offering optimal user experience on all devices.

deploy.title: Deployment & Maintenance
deploy.description: Continuous deployment and maintenance of your applications.

youCode.description: YouCode is a web development institute in partnership with UM6P, Simplon France, and OCP. The program offers comprehensive full-stack training with Laravel and Vue.js, followed by specialization in Java or JS full-stack in the second year.

simplon.field: General Training Certificate (CFG), Programming / Computer Developer
